txt.en: Explore the sewers and confront Gárvadach
Gárvadach has met his demise at the hands of a... giant rat? It seems this \qking of rats\q will not stand for more trespassers!
Lágsaith has begun her tale. With the heavy Angmarim presence in the sewers, Gárvadach cannot be far.
Many dangerous creatures have called the sewers of Carn Dûm home. Some have remained rumours, nothing more. Others, however, may be of interest to the scattered remnants of the Iron Crown.
Explore the sewers and confront Gárvadach (again)
Gárvadach has been discovered, and he is not happy about this untimely interruption.
A heavily injured Gárvadach has fled deeper into the sewers.
Sensing its oncoming defeat, Rádarríg scurries away!
